title: PumpRules: Diss Engaged
description:
For those of you who can't make the 2022 Golden Crappies Awards  in-person this year, experience it live digitally from the comfort of your own home at momenthouse.com/wwc

The season finale of Vanderpump Rules is a glorious mess, and we're absolutely thrilled about it. Scheana and Brock manage to ruin James and Raquel's engagement party... or maybe it was Lala who did that. Either way, it's a battle of egos and tackiness, and we are here for this sort of energy.

This is Crappens on Demand; so you can watch us record the recap here: https://www.patreon.com/posts/61384403
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
